---
title: "Our Rodent Species"
---
<br>

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

table_in <- read.csv("www/rodents.csv")
table_in$species[is.na(table_in$species)] <- "NA"


table_out <- data.frame(Rodents         = paste0("!['", table_in$image_alt_text, "'](www/", table_in$species, ".png)"),
                        Scientific.Name = table_in$scientific_name,
                        Common.Name     = table_in$common_name,
                        Description     = table_in$species_description)

knitr::kable(table_out)

```
